overview.subtitle: Connecting core economic corridors across Eurasia
overview.p1: Sagoke proudly operates Sagoke Express, a premium rail service directly linking China to key European cities.
overview.p2: Regular weekly departures, stable schedules and door-to-door delivery across the network.
overview.p3: With our extensive network and professional team, we are committed to providing the best logistics services.

advantages.title: Competitive Advantages
advantages.desc: As transport frequency becomes normalized, Sagoke continues to optimize and improve efficiency.

list.stableSchedule: Stable schedule: multiple routes and sufficient capacity for all needs.
list.robustResources: Robust resources: 50,000+ self-owned TEU containers, 200+ overseas depots.
list.intelligentTracking: Intelligent tracking: real-time monitoring throughout the entire journey.
list.expertTeam: Expert team: 20+ years of deep industry experience.

cta.title: Whatever you need, we are ready to assist you

hero.title: ABOUT SAGOKE
hero.subtitle: 20+ years journey of building Asia-Europe logistics connection

overview.imageAlt: Our company consists of talented people dedicated to customers
overview.heading: Our company consists of talented people dedicated to customers
overview.paragraph1: About Sagoke: Sagoke is proud to be one of the leading logistics companies in Vietnam, with over 20 years of experience in international transportation and logistics. We specialize in providing integrated logistics solutions from Asia to Europe.
overview.paragraph2: With a team of experienced experts and an extensive partner network, Sagoke is committed to providing high-quality, reliable and efficient logistics services. We continuously innovate and apply advanced technology to optimize transportation processes.
overview.paragraph3: Our mission is to connect businesses with global markets through smart, sustainable and environmentally friendly logistics solutions. Each shipment is not just transportation but also a reliable bridge for customers' business development.

timeline.title: Development History
y2002_2005: Expanded domestic operations in key nodes.
y2006_2010: Established branches in Tianjin and Shanghai.
y2011_2015: Launched comprehensive rail services to Central Asia and Europe.
y2016_2020: Opened overseas offices and cross-border corridors.
Upgraded multimodal operations with digital tracking.
y2021_2024: Developed green and sustainable logistics services.
Integrated AI and IoT into logistics processes.

philosophy.title: Philosophy
philosophy.intro: Sagoke is committed to becoming a reliable logistics company, providing friendly and sustainable solutions for global economic development.

vision.title: Vision
vision.desc: To become a trusted bridge for Asia-Europe logistics solutions, contributing to building a connected and sustainable world.

mission.title: Mission
mission.desc: Provide high-quality, continuous and efficient logistics services with dedicated service spirit.

certs.title: EHS management system certification
certs.desc: Sagoke is proud to maintain strict international standards for quality, environment and occupational safety. These certifications affirm our commitment to providing excellent service and protecting the environment.

awards.title: Awards
awards.desc: These valuable honors are testament to Sagoke's relentless efforts in improving service quality and making positive contributions to Vietnam's logistics industry.
